name: Coin me up !
description:
You're the last person in this town. If you want to survive, you'll have no choice but to cooperate with this coin craved crazy vending machine that appeared in front of you . However annoying it can be...

ZQSD/QWSD/Arrows to move

Mouse to look

E to grab things

Click to throw coins

Note that the WebGL build is unstable and crashes randomly (usually during the introduction). Please use the Windows / Linux build if possible.
